pages.text: > $(n)Health:$() 20 + 2 Armor  $(br)> $(n)Attack Damage:$() $(br)2.5 on easy, 3 + hunger on normal, 4.5 + hunger on hard $(br)> $(n)Behavior:$() Hostile     $(br)> $(n)Spawn:$() Desert    $(br)> $(n)Properties:$() $(br)A $(thing)Husk$() is a variant of $(thing)Zombie$() that spawns in deserts. Unlike $(thing)Zombies$(), they do not burn in sunlight. They are healed by $(thing)Instant Damage$() and harmed by $(thing)Instant Health$() effects, are immune to $(thing)Regeneration$() and $(thing)Poison effects$().
$(n)Drops:$() 0-2 Rotten Flesh, Equipment, 2.5% chance for Iron Ingots 2.5% chance for Carrots, 2.5% chance for Potatoes $(br)$(n)XP:$() adult 5-17, baby 12
